item.title: Local Fractional Calculus currently. A Mosaic of Definitions and the Quest for Unification
item.description: arXiv:2508.19253v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this paper, we present an overview of the development of one of the most dynamic areas of mathematics today: local differential operators of non-integer order. The underlying question is whether we are witnessing a period of consolidation and are on the way to a general formulation of this fascinating topic.
item.dc:creator: Juan E. N\'apoles Vald\'es
